dsv.name: Ozka Loltechno
dsv.address: Clements' Farmhouse, Landing Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Struggling actor who thought DarkStar Vale would be rehab. Ends up recruited into some soul-destroying quest. Thinks the whole story revolves around them.

dsv.name: Proctra Storo
dsv.address: Sylvester's Convenience Store, 6 Amimia Square, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Stunning bisexual witch. With aspirations of Evollish power since childhood, she enjoys the opportunities of Ray's Temple Coven. Loves using deadlight to control people, and telepathy to freak them out.

dsv.name: Ratshit Ruddy
dsv.address: Dento's Forge, 4 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Hoped his DarkStar Vale trip was a singles holiday. Humps the leg of anyone femme-presenting during conversation. Sent to work as Dento's apprentice.

dsv.name: Hazel Better
dsv.address: 13 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Spoilt daughter of a famous Wellish doctor. Thought DarkStar Vale was an artists' retreat but given a schoolteacher's job. Welcomed onto the village committee after impressing Mr Hampton by bullying vulnerable children.

dsv.name: Atlas Better
dsv.address: 13 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Followed his wife here to a supposed artists' retreat. Hates artists, along with gays, disabled people, and the mentally ill. Happy getting schoolteacher's job where he could bully disabled children.

dsv.name: Victor Piring
dsv.address: Flat 31, Yellow Three Eleven, Ghexa Canyon
dsv.bio: Socially awkward vampire. Former dealer and addict who switched to regular, store-bought blood in his latest attempt at sobriety. His life got even weirder once his houseplant started talking.

dsv.name: Tigsy Toxington
dsv.address: Flat 35, Magenta Two Four, Ghexa Canyon
dsv.bio: Victor's schoolboy crush who later became his favourite customer. Works in an office where everyone fancies her. Enjoys how weird shit happens around Victor that keeps life interesting.

dsv.name: Percy Plant
dsv.address: Flat 31, Yellow Three Eleven, Ghexa Canyon
dsv.bio: Became conscious on Victor's windowsill and freaked him out by winking. Consumed by near-constant urge to mock Victor. Talks a lot of shit for an actual plant.

dsv.name: Ray(a)
dsv.address: Spooky hut behind Rhea Temple, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Former Evollish who got corrupted by Reckish deadlight (a fancy term for, they became a sinister twat). Recruits disciples into their Temple Coven, where they teach deadlight manipulation. Wants someone to fetch them six magic crystals, presumably for harmless reasons.

dsv.name: Kestral Eastwood
dsv.presentColour: Godish indigo with pale peach streaks
dsv.address: 6 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Local tradeswoman, and member of DarkStar Vale's village committee. Has two mysteriously dead husbands. She might eat your soul, or she might build you a wicked new conservatory.

dsv.name: Mr Hampton
dsv.address: 1 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.family: Brad Hampton (son), Michelle Amiza (ex-wife), Daisy Amiza (estranged daughter)
dsv.bio: Chairman of Darkstar Vale's village committee. Fights Michelle and Ray for influence over the growing settlement's population. Overly authoritarian, with suspected ties to ScapeStead's new management.

dsv.name: Kane Marsh
dsv.address: 7 Landing Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.family: Michelle Hampton (adopted mother), Daisy Hampton (adopted sister)
dsv.bio: Angry janitor and local misanthrope. Unofficially adopted by Michelle after escaping a troubled past. Traumatised by Ozka's resemblance to his dead wife.

dsv.name: Widge Daksho
dsv.presentColour: Oprish orange with pale peach fade
dsv.address: 132 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Member of the Temple Coven. Aspiring rockstar. Gay, melancholy, often stoned.

dsv.name: Cometina Kalsha
dsv.address: 16 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Temple Coven member and cam model. Enjoys having a reason to wear make-up in this dead-end town. Fancied by most people.

dsv.name: Dento Kalberg
dsv.address: Dento's Forge, 4 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Local blacksmith. Kind-hearted but depressed. Dislikes his new apprentice.

dsv.name: Michelle Amiza
dsv.address: 7 Landing Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.family: Daisy Amiza (daughter), Brad Hampton (son), Mr Hampton (ex-husband), Kane (adopted son)
dsv.bio: Good witch who runs DarkStar Vale's animal sanctuary and hippy gift shop. Hosts Sanctuary Circle, training villagers in the art of lifelight manipulation. Often tripping balls.

dsv.name: Daisy Amiza
dsv.address: 7 Landing Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.family: Michelle Amiza (mother), Mr Hampton (estranged father), Brad (estranged brother), Kane Marsh (adopted brother)
dsv.bio: Clever, precocious child. Enjoys toys, books, ice cream, and being smarter than most grown-ups. Being homeschooled because the Vale's newest teachers are fascists.

dsv.name: Molly Eastwood
dsv.address: 6 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Studious young woman remotely attending Godish university. Too nice for the village committee or Temple Coven, and too science-focussed for the Sanctuary Circle. Hopes a nearby space station might one day hire her as an engineer.

dsv.name: Alistair Gator
dsv.address: Gator's Bar, Amimia Square, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Gay, trans former rave kid. Runs the Vale's only nightlife venue, provding alcohol and live music. Considered joining the Temple Coven, but thought Ray was a prick.

dsv.name: Snuffle Nose
dsv.address: Wherever he deigns to visit
dsv.bio: Resident feline anifrag. Proud cat with impressive telepathic and teleportation ability. Smarter than most Chromans and humans, which isn't saying much.

dsv.name: Sylvester Storo
dsv.presentColour: Wellish golden with pale peach blotches
dsv.address: Sylvester's Convenience Store, Amimia Square, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Successful businessman and council member corrupted by capitalist ambition and Mr Hampton's influence. Mistrusts young people, the unemployed and anyone not sober. Fun at parties.

dsv.name: Snowi Eastwood
dsv.address: 6 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Former Chroman Army cadet, stranded in DarkStar Vale while visiting family. Joined the Temple Coven as his best chance of escape. Enjoys hosting druggy gatherings with the crew in his attic bedroom.

dsv.name: Dolores Daksho
dsv.presentColour: Oprish orange with pale peach blotches
dsv.address: 132 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Shy, lonely daydreamer. Obsessed with finding love. Member of Sanctuary Circle and frequent babysitter to Daisy.

dsv.name: Ella Daksho
dsv.address: 132 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Alcoholic war widow. Drinks away her army pension in Gator's bar. Can't be bothered joining any town factions because none have booze at their meetings.

dsv.name: Emmett Gold
dsv.presentColour: Pyrish gold with pale peach streaks
dsv.address: Gold Practice, Amimia Square, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Village doctor and council member. Inherited the town practice from a Godish doctor who mysteriously disappeared. Gets enraged by unhealthy, counter-cultural lifestyle choices, like a twat.

dsv.name: Lucia Storo
dsv.presentColour: Pyrish gold with pale peach stripes
dsv.address: Sylvester's Convenience Store, Amimia Square, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Bored housewife hooked on prescription sedatives. Member of the village council. Drinks a lot of tea.

dsv.name: Brad Hampton
dsv.address: 1 Temple Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.family: Mr Hampton (father), Michelle Amiza (estranged mother), Daisy Amiza (estranged sister)
dsv.bio: Clueless teenager who enjoys shooting hoops. Drugged with steroids and anti-psychotics by his controlling father. Mocked by the Temple Coven for being less cool than them.

dsv.name: Bonnie Kalsha
dsv.address: 16 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Naïve hippy chick with complex mental health issues who writes strange poetry. Both Michelle and Ray are drawn to her otherworldly energy. Sanctuary Circle is safer for her than Temple Coven.

dsv.name: Clark Kalsha
dsv.address: 16 River Road, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Served in the Chroman Army with his wife before developing PTSD after her death. Agoraphobic who barely leaves his bedroom. Lets his elder daughter, Cometina, run the household.

dsv.name: Lexo-Woodman
dsv.address: Abandoned train carriage south of the river, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Homeless dude who converses with squirrels. The only resident not to arrive with ScapeStead inc. Bizarre backstory involving a desert city.

dsv.name: Braxa-Velin
dsv.address: Brando's Lodge, Reckland Mountain, near DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Retired warrior who runs the Val'es Predian meeting place. Avoids of village politics. Gives a lot of courageous advice for an opium addict.

dsv.name: Cuthbert Catting
dsv.address: Flat 30, Yellow Three Eleven, Ghexa Canyon
dsv.bio: Victor's snooty neighbour. Middle management alcoholic. Hates having a loser drug dealer next door.

dsv.name: Wonkali-Rivers
dsv.address: Riverside shack, near Zimsela bridge, DarkStar Vale
dsv.bio: Aging drug casualty who lives near the river. Been a mess since his former housemate disappeared. Thinks everyone should try a spot of fishing.

dsv.name: Patch Cutford
dsv.address: Flat 35, Magenta Two Four, Ghexa Canyon
dsv.bio: Tigsy's bitchy flatmate. Joins an investigatory mission because she thinks there'll be a television crew. Highly fashionable and a total snob.
